 2018-12652018-10-04,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectMarie-Claire Obéron ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Guy Arsenault **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MARIE-CLAIRE OBÉRON, survivor of the Hon. Guy Arsenault, a puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the district of Montréal, in and for the Province of Quebec, effective July 9, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
